initialValue.title: Expert care tailored to how your brand grows.
initialValue.description: Two teams, one partnership. Switch between Marketing and Web to explore the specialist services we bring together.

marketing.label: Marketing
marketing.headline: We help brands grow across the full funnel.
marketing.description: From acquisition to retention, we plan and optimize the touchpoints that matter.

services.title: Full-Funnel Performance
services.summary: Campaign architecture that follows your customer from awareness to retention with measurable milestones along the way.
services.description: We design experiments and reporting loops that connect every stage of the funnel, so we can re-invest in what compounds.

services.title: Paid Search
services.summary: High-intent capture on Google and Microsoft Ads with creative testing, negative keyword hygiene, and live dashboards.
services.description: From keyword mining to smart bidding calibration, we keep your account efficient while scaling profitable conversions.

services.title: Paid Social
services.summary: Stories and feeds that convert. We iterate fast across Meta, TikTok, and LinkedIn with creative sprints and cohort reporting.
services.description: Lean into creative volume and audience insights to keep your acquisition curve healthy across every platform.

services.title: E-Mail Marketing
services.summary: Lifecycle flows, broadcast campaigns, and segmentation that keeps customers moving without feeling spammed.
services.description: Automations and newsletters tuned for retention—mixing personalization, testing, and deliverability best practice.

web.label: Web
web.headline: We design and ship fast, resilient web experiences.
web.description: Websites, products, and commerce—built to scale and easy to maintain.

services.title: Hjemmesider
services.summary: Conversion-first marketing sites built with Next.js, tuned for performance, localization, and a design system you can scale.
services.description: Launch a flagship experience with CMS workflows, modular sections, and analytics wired in from day one.

services.title: CRM
services.summary: Implementations and automations that keep your pipeline visible and optimised across marketing and sales teams.
services.description: We audit, migrate, and extend tools like HubSpot and Salesforce so your data syncs cleanly across the stack.

services.title: AI
services.summary: Pragmatic AI integrations powered by your real workflows—assistants, automation, and data loops that actually save time.
services.description: Experiment quickly with prototypes, then harden the winners into production features with clear guardrails.

services.title: eCommerce
services.summary: Composable commerce experiences with fast product discovery, checkout clarity, and analytics wired in from day one.
services.description: Optimise merchandising, PDP storytelling, and retention journeys with a modern commerce stack.

initialValue.headline: We build digital experiences that move the metrics you care about
initialValue.subheading: Strategy, engineering, design, and growth sit under one roof—so we can translate your ambition into experiments, launches, and optimizations that compound over time.

stats.label: Digital specialists on the core team
Average client NPS over the past year

fields.description: Add one or more featured cards. Each card can link to CMS content or a manual URL, and you can override the image, title, and copy per card.

fields.title: Cards

fields.description: Use for external or bespoke URLs. Include protocol for external links (https://).
fields.name: href
fields.title: Manual URL

fields.description: Shown on the card. For linked content, leave blank to inherit the document title.
fields.name: title

fields.description: Short supporting copy. Falls back to the linked document summary when left blank.
fields.name: excerpt
fields.title: Description

fields.description: Small label under the copy (e.g. ‘Latest entries’).
fields.name: metaLabel

fields.description: Upload to override the linked document image or provide art for manual cards.
fields.name: image
fields.title: Card image

fields.name: headline
fields.title: Headline (shown when this tab is active)

fields.description: Optional title used in the right-hand detail panel. Defaults to the service title.

fields.title: Detail title

fields.description: Used to create stable IDs for the frontend. Leave as generated unless you have a specific requirement.

fields.description: Upload an MP4 or WebM file. Optional if a video URL is provided.

fields.title: Video file

fields.description: Optional poster image for the video

fields.title: Poster image

fields.description: Legacy manual color. Prefer the tone selector below.
fields.name: background
fields.title: Background color

fields.description: Choose one of the three presets used by Service cards. No custom colors.
fields.name: tone
fields.title: Card color

fields.title: Logo (quote cards)
